attributes.action: Remove nurses in uniform from Tesco advert.
attributes.additional_details: Infection control prevents nurses wearing uniforms to complete shopping outside working hours. The advert depicts a nurse in uniform doing her food shopping which is a breach of infection control policy within each hospital/care setting where uniforms are worn. Even worse they depict this scene during a global pandemic, this is an incorrect display of nurses and damaging to their reputation.
attributes.background: Nurses are not permitted to wear their uniforms outside of work to do shopping and this is being advertised on the current Tesco advert. I want Tesco to remove this depiction from their advert.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for Tesco.
